body: Hi Ludvig, The way the contours are generated right now is by extruding the mesh and then calculate mesh plane intersection. There are mathematical solutions to find the contours based on points and values but I haven't tried them myself. Here is the d3 example: [https://github.com/d3/d3-contour/blob/master/src/contours.js](https://github.com/d3/d3-contour/blob/master/src/contours.js)
